channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Wild weather blamed for deaths of 3 kids in Michigan and man in an Amish buggy in Indiana
item.description: Three children died in Michigan after a tree struck their van Sunday as powerful storms swept the region.

item.title: Evacuations ordered as winds pose challenges for firefighters battling California blaze
Judge weighs request to withhold investigation records in deaths of Gene Hackman and wife
